channel.title: OblivionPK - The Legendary RSPS is back [BETA]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s1.postimg.org/x1rnxtb3z/2itimua.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i776.photobucket.com/albums/yy41/tom14431996/icon_homepage.png[/img] Website - [URL=http://"http://www.OblivionPk.com"]www.OblivionPk.com[/URL] (Still under work)
:D[B][COLOR=#008000]Open Beta [/COLOR] :D OblivionPk is now currently in Open Beta mode which means anyone can participate and enjoy the server and see what has been done so far, but remember that the server will change alot as we progress, add new stuff and find bugs. The main point in this Beta is to find bugs/glitches and report all faults immediately. The server is running on a not so good VPS atm so there will be laggs im sorry! [QUOTE][URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/s/o1kelatqi8t94pn/OblivionPk.jar"]Downloadable Client[/URL][/QUOTE]
[img]http://media.giphy.com/media/3o85xBtFKX01Q62iaY/giphy.gif[/img]
[COLOR=#008000]Introduction[/COLOR][/B] [FONT=century gothic]Currently making a oldshcool classic RSPS type server which is mainly based of Economy/Pking which means that some items will be available for free to make Pking active and as enjoyable as possible for ya'll Pk fans, and at the same time money will be worth in this server and in order to get money to buy better gear. we implemented skilling such as woodcutting, thieving and mining. [/FONT] [SPOILER=Media] [IMG]http://s21.postimg.org/fmz3ihohj/642e4253984373334e68e52cb76647f1.png[/img] [IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/56geuirx1/Oblivion_Pk_screenshot_4.png[/img] [IMG]http://s22.postimg.org/471vicypd/c82e1dd9e97c2208be61ce31f6d91138.png[/img] [IMG]http://s9.postimg.org/j5gikkq7j/855d44a92259d6a767b3ff6656f7e49b.png[/img] [IMG]http://s13.postimg.org/soqt24l47/obpk_old.png[/img][IMG]http://s30.postimg.org/43muqu1ep/327b000cd2c42b2e193b31c6ed168531.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=GIF][IMG]https://gifyu.com/images/cebc4ebc6306aef870688c091779ece6.gif[/img] [IMG]http://media.giphy.com/media/3o85xm0ZOeO8h4NjO0/giphy.gif[/img][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Old Media][video=youtube;mnoM10GtJPE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mnoM10GtJPE[/video][/SPOILER]
[COLOR=#008000][SIZE=2][B]What is OblivionPk?[/B][/SIZE][/COLOR] [FONT=century gothic]OblivionPk is a very known name for the RSPS history when OBPK was a top server in 2008-2010 made by a great developer called Sanity & Brent. OblivionPk is now on its way to climb to the top once again slowly but surely.
[SIZE=2][COLOR=#008000][B][FONT=arial]OBPK banners since the beginning: [/FONT][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#008000] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][SPOILER=BANNERS][IMG]http://s23.postimg.org/jb1epxygr/obpk.png[/img][FONT=century gothic] [/FONT][IMG]http://s7.postimg.org/hnqm5z8uj/obpkbanner6copy.png[/img] [IMG]http://s16.postimg.org/bc7fm9tqt/obpk_banner_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://s17.postimg.org/5hbgaox27/oblivionpk_1.png[/img][/SPOILER][FONT=century gothic] [/FONT]
[/CENTER]

item.title: OblivionPK - The Legendary RSPS is back [BETA]
item.dc:creator: @Onur-163 Onur-163
item.description:
@Onur-163 wrote:

[CENTER]

Website - www.OblivionPk.com (Still under work)

:D[B][COLOR=#008000]Open Beta [/COLOR]
OblivionPk is now currently in Open Beta mode which means anyone can participate and enjoy the server and see what has
been done so far, but remember that the server will change alot as we progress, add new stuff and find bugs. The main point in this Beta is to find bugs/glitches and report all faults immediately. The server is running on a not so good VPS atm so there will be laggs im sorry!

Downloadable Client

[COLOR=#008000]Introduction[/COLOR][/B]
[FONT=century gothic]Currently making a oldshcool classic RSPS type server which is mainly based of Economy/Pking which means that some items will be available for free to make Pking active and as enjoyable as possible for ya’ll Pk fans, and at the same time money will be worth in this server and in order to get money to buy better gear. we implemented skilling such as woodcutting, thieving and mining. [/FONT]
[SPOILER=Media] [/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=GIF]

giphy.gif760×496
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=Old Media][video=youtube;mnoM10GtJPE]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mnoM10GtJPE[/video][/SPOILER]

[COLOR=#008000][SIZE=2]What is OblivionPk?[/SIZE][/COLOR]
[FONT=century gothic]OblivionPk is a very known name for the RSPS history when OBPK was a top server in 2008-2010 made by a great
developer called Sanity & Brent. OblivionPk is now on its way to climb to the top once again slowly but surely.

[SIZE=2][COLOR=#008000][FONT=arial]OBPK banners since the beginning:
[/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#008000]
